description: Defines a Flutter widget for the splash screen that attempts auto-login and navigates accordingly.

classes.name: SplashPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the splash screen which attempts auto-login.

classes.name: _SplashPageState
classes.description: State class managing the splash page's logic and UI.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget.

methods.name: _SplashPageState
methods.description: State class containing the logic for the splash page.

methods.name: _bootstrap
methods.description: Attempts to auto-login and then navigates based on success or failure.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the splash screen UI with a logo and progress indicator.
